DroidBench.Author: Serval, SnT, University of Luxembourg
DroidBench.Description: A deviceid within an Intent is transfered to another Component by ICC method startActivity. And then the deviceid is logged. The two components are in the same application.
DroidBench.Challenge: First, the analysis has to find the link between two components cased by startActivity. Second, the analysis has to be aware that a sensitive data (deviceid) is transferred to another component within an Intent.
